name: IB_LAB_SPECIMEN_ID
description: This table contains a list of Lab Specimen IDs (OVS) related to the current message.  Clinical Lab will have only a single ID, while in the Anatomic Pathology module multiple specimens may be a part of a single case (REQ).

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the In Basket message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
